author: Ian Murray
comment: Yes! 24hr mode has been added as an option. I was waiting for this and now the watch face has it, I've purchased Pro after being a free user for a good while.  Pleased with the customisable options which accompany the purchase. The only thing which saves the face getting a full 5 stars is subscription weather. I hear what the dev says about the quality, but could we not at least have the option of a no cost (but not as accurate) setting? Echo others in hoping complications are on route also.  Nice, clean, usable face - thanks.

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Thank you, Ian, for this honest feedback. Please check out our other watch face, PhotoWear, which does include complications: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sparkistic.photowear

author: Almond Ponge
comment: This is growing to be my favorite watchface, but the unfortunate lack of an option for translucent peek cards is steering me away from it (since I cannot see the date / battery and even the hour sometimes when I have a notification compared to other face watches). Would certainly love having this feature on my Moto 360!

author: Jagdeep Singh
comment: It's great. Please add option to display Realfeel temperature and current temperature on watch face not just condition. I hope complications are coming soon. Thank you

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Good ideas! Thank you for the review.

author: John Bocalig
comment: My favorite watchface so far. I hope complications are on the roadmap!

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Thank you, John, for the positive review! Complications are coming soon!! :)

author: Lisa Mumm
comment: App caused screen ghosting (dead unfixable pixes). Otherwise loved it. Have both versions.

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: We're sorry to hear that you're having pixel issues with your watch. Just A Minute leverages standard Android Wear technology to prevent this kind of thing from happening. We suggest that you contact the manufacturer of your watch to see if anything can be done to remedy the situation.

author: Abdul Majid Farooqi
comment: Feature Request: I like your app very much, but I've request that please add an option in which we can place hour in place of minutes and vice versa, I'll give you 5 stars indeed. Thanks

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Thanks for the idea! Just A Minute was created as a minute-forward design with the minutes highlighted as the most important information that you can see at a glance.

author: Jon Grad
comment: I did not authorize a $0.99 / month subscription. Woke up to a confirmation email. Beware of this scam. I usually never do this but honestly it did that all on its own.

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Hi Jon, the weather subscription is opt-in. That is, you are not subscribed by default, and you can cancel it at any time. Please write us at support@sparkistic.com so that we can help you further.

author: Giuliano Fichera
comment: Very minimal watchface, love it! I'm really looking forward for sandard android wear complications!

author: _artem_
comment: use selected temperature unit also on watch face. if I selected °C I don't want to see 70+ degrees!!!!! what about saving own customizations to patterns, so I can select these after experimenting with colors and settings

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback, we'll investigate and release a fix for the issue with the units displaying incorrectly on the watch face. If you have other suggestions please contact us at support@sparkistic.com thanks!

author: d
comment: nice design but needs a non subscription option

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Thanks, David. We tried out the weather from free providers and the data quality was very poor.

author: David Whip
comment: Most visible of watch faces

author: thesmallthinkable
comment: Great, love the design

author: Ismaila Mohammed
comment: excellent

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Thank you!

author: Mark Fletcher
comment: Not sure what is happening, but I installed the watch face (on LG GWatch R) and it didn't come up as a face option on my watch. Paid for pro and no way to get a refund. Also does not appear in my list of installed apps... I have to search for it. Might be my phone playing about.

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Hello Mark, we are sad to hear you are having trouble. Please contact us at support@sparkistic.com so we can help.

author: Elizabeth Rosenberry
comment: It works! If you could make the ambient mode look just like when it is in full lit mode, it would be perfect! An option for full display in ambient mode please. :)

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Hi Elizabeth, we are so glad to hear it's working now! Thanks for the suggestion. We'll add it to our feature request list.

author: Nikita Akimov
comment: I love the app and is my favourite watch face. I've been using it for more than a year and I don't want to switch.

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Hi Nikita, thank you for the very positive review! We're so glad you love the watch face - it's our favorite too! :)

comment: add complications and a squared order of the numbers and I'll buy the pro version.

author: Azraf kamarudin
comment: It's just super awesome. By the way, possible to get both watch and phone battery shown  on the screen?

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Thank you, Azraf! We'll add your suggestion to our future idea list.

author: Lonnie Hansen Jr
comment: I like this watchmaker it is my current.  I wish it had a step counter

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Thank you, Lonnie. We will add that idea to our future feature list.

author: Max Gromov
comment: Pay for premium and pay every month for weather.. Realy?

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Hello Max! The weather subscription option (charged every few months) helps us cover the ongoing expense for quality data from our provider, DarkSky, and supports future development of the watch face. Thank you for your support.

author: David Miles
comment: My main watch face. Simple clean look with lots of cutomizations

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Thank you! More new features coming soon. :)

author: Robert Andino
comment: Awesome !!!

comment: amazing, and simple

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Thank you, Mahmoud!

author: Dean Lewis
comment: In the app I was deeply concerned about the subscription until I came to the play store and saw how subscriptions work and how to cancel. In the app there should be info about that because there's nothing scarier than feeling you're signed up for an indefinite paid subscription.  I'll do it for a while, the watch face seems to tick the right boxes visually and functionality.

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Thank you for the feedback! We will add information regarding how to subscribe and unsubscribe to make it more clear. We are currently working on additional weather functionality. Be on the lookout for an update soon!

author: Larry Klipstein
comment: One of the best watch faces ever!! Just upgraded to the weather, EXCELLENT JOB!  Use this there most out of all faces available. I've deleted all the other faces I've downloaded. Why bother? This is the BEST!! Still is the BEST!

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Thank you, Larry!

author: Mike Røntved
comment: Best watchface for your every day travelling, quick at finding the information you need. I would love if you can add an option to swap the hour with the minute position.
title: Just great! Also really battery friendly!

comment: This is my 1st purchase in play store I'm loving this android wear look. It will be great include weather in pro purchase since this currently need to be bought separately.

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Thank you, Prem!

comment: One of the best face watch ever! This face watch is a keeper. Highly recommended...

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Thank you, Cecily! Stay tuned for a new release with more exciting features.

comment: Very minimalistic and so simple to use. Can't wait for the upcoming features. Keep it simple.

reply.content: Thank you, Toby! Stay tuned for a new release with more exciting features.

author: Andrei
comment: I like it very much, I use it on my LG G watch R.                                                      L.E. I like it so much I bought it yesterday. I really like the pro features, keep up the good work guys!  Some suggestions from my side: 1. A way to select the weather provider because I have different forcasts on my phone and watch (s7 default forcats provider is AccuWeather) 2. Display only the batery procentage without the icon (IMO it occupies too much space)

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Thanks for the great review, Andrei!

title: Works great

author: Carlos Alexney Herrera
comment: Looks good, innovative, works good also. But the idea about the subscription service to get weather information isn't a good one. People would rather pay for the app as a one time thing only than have a monthly subscription since Google app can give you that info for free. If you guys turn it into a paid app you are gonna sell way more than using the subscription. I've seen lots of comments like mine around the subscription for getting additional stuff. Other than that it is great app!

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Hello Carlos! Thank you for the candid feedback. The weather subscription option helps us cover the ongoing expense for quality data from our provider, DarkSky, and helps support future development of the watch face -- and we have some awesome new features planned! Our research has shown that most users prefer free apps with the option to upgrade.

title: It's ok

author: Kevin Hayes
comment: Updated to Pro.. And very pleased.   It would be fantastic if it was possible to include a visual alert to upcoming events by having the font or background change color... Looks great and the highlighting of the minutes is ideal for keeping track of the time before your next scheduled activity

reply.author: Sparkistic LLC
reply.content: Thanks, Kevin, for this great feedback and perfect example of how Just A Minute is useful.

title: Great Display
